changes: The Formatting Toolbar is here! You can toggle it per-device in App Settings.
You can now improve the readability of active docs by customizing the max-width to better fit your needs (defaults to 100 characters).
There is a new 'Auto' appearance option that will match your system theme. It is the default for new users, and you can update it for yourself in App Settings.
Formatting tokens (#, *, etc) now have better contrast with the surrounding text.
Additionally, this release includes dependency updates, performance improvements, and small bugfixes.
Drag-and-drop or paste files to upload and attach to the current doc (Octo Pro).
Changelog notifications are displayed when Octo updates.
Improvements have been made to IME language support.
Regular expressions are automatically recognized by the /.*/i syntax in searches.
The Active Context bar has been merged into the navigation menu.
The legacy Markdown editor has been removed in favor of Ink.
The Daily Notepad page now works offline.
Vim Mode can be enabled on the Settings page.
